about_the_game:
This Pack includes:

  • F-4S Phantom II (Rank 7 USA);

  • Premium account for 20 days;

  • 2500 Golden Eagles.

The F-4S Phantom II is an advanced modification developed in 1975 to extend the service life of the F-4J.

Compared to its predecessor, the F-4S boasts significantly improved maneuverability due to the leading-edge slats on the wings. It doesn’t come with the standard internal cannon but can equip a double-barreled 20 mm gun pod under the fuselage. The F-4S offers a staggering amount of weaponry to choose from. For air-to-air combat, it can carry a wealth of AIM-9H and AIM-7F missiles. For ground strike operations, you can mix and match between Zuni or FFAR Mighty Mouse unguided rockets, 250, 500, 750, and 1000 pound bombs, and even Snakeye drag bombs and incendiary bombs!

The F-4S is a true cutting-edge Phantom, with its array of missiles and advanced radar setting it apart in the air, and its impressive loadout of ground ordnance giving it enough payload to level anything on the battlefield.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!

  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.
detailed_description:
Note!

This product cannot be purchased for PlayStation® or Xbox accounts!

This DLC will only be granted to the Steam account that was used to make the purchase. If you have some issues, please contact our support (login on the website and use the "Submit a request" button at the top).


About the Game

This Pack includes:

  • F-4S Phantom II (Rank 7 USA);

  • Premium account for 20 days;

  • 2500 Golden Eagles.

The F-4S Phantom II is an advanced modification developed in 1975 to extend the service life of the F-4J.

Compared to its predecessor, the F-4S boasts significantly improved maneuverability due to the leading-edge slats on the wings. For air-to-air combat, it can carry a wealth of AIM-9H and AIM-7F missiles. For ground strike operations, you can mix and match between Zuni or FFAR Mighty Mouse unguided rockets, 250, 500, 750, and 1000 pound bombs, and even Snakeye drag bombs and incendiary bombs!

The F-4S is a true cutting-edge Phantom, with its array of missiles and advanced radar setting it apart in the air, and its impressive loadout of ground ordnance giving it enough payload to level anything on the battlefield.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista SP1, Windows 7
  • Processor:2,2 GHz
  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 6XXX series or higher; AMD Radeon 1XXX series or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:8 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *:Windows 7
  • Processor:Dual-Core 2,4 GHz
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 460 or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:8 MB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
